title: News24.com | FULL SPEECH | Covid-19 crisis will not last forever, but impact needs extraordinary budget - Ramaphosa
description: South Africa's economic response to the coronavirus pandemic can be divided into three phases, President Cyril Ramaphosa announced on Tuesday evening in an update to the nation. He said the pandemic requires an economic response that is equal to the scale of …
